solution_line_template: In the beginning, Jina has {initial_teddies} teddies * {bunnies_multiplier} bunnies/teddy = <<{initial_teddies}*{bunnies_multiplier}={initial_bunnies}>>{initial_bunnies} bunnies.

So her mom decided to give her {initial_bunnies} bunnies * {additional_teddies_per_bunny} teddies/bunny = <<{initial_bunnies}*{additional_teddies_per_bunny}={additional_teddies_from_mom}>>{additional_teddies_from_mom} teddies.

So in total Jina has {initial_teddies} teddies + {initial_bunnies} bunnies + {koala_bear} koala + {additional_teddies_from_mom} teddies = <<{initial_teddies}+{initial_bunnies}+{koala_bear}+{additional_teddies_from_mom}={total_mascots}>>{total_mascots} mascots.
